data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Shigatse. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Shigatse, Xizang, China
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, make the 64,125 believers in Shigatse to be brave and clear with the gospel to their 781,175 neighbors.
data.verse: So Paul and Barnabas spent considerable time there, speaking boldly for the Lord, who confirmed the message of his grace by enabling them to perform signs and wonders.

data.section_summary: On average, 107 babies will be born in the next 100 hours to families who are far from God in Shigatse, Xizang, China.
data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to these new families.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Shigatse, Xizang, China that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the church in Shigatse, Xizang, China to make the most of every opportunity.
data.verse: Be very careful, then, how you live—not as unwise but as wise, making the most of every opportunity, because the days are evil.

data.prayer: Lord, I thank you that you will bring health and a cure to the Sherpa people. Reveal to them abundance of peace and truth.
Father, please raise up every one you have called in Shigatse, Xizang, China to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.prayer: Father, thank you that you will never abandon the church of Shigatse, Xizang, China.
data.verse: Be free from the love of money, content with such things as you have, for he has said, “I will in no way leave you, neither will I in any way forsake you.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the county of Shigatse to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

location.name: Shigatse
location.people_groups_list: Tibetan Gtsang, Sarki, Thami, Groma, Tibetan Gtsang
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Tibetan Gtsang (900), Sarki (1,600), Thami (600), Groma (19,000), Tibetan Gtsang (766,000)
